summary: A few Reshade presets designed to add unique colors to the game without steam-rolling FPS. Uses Reshade 3.x
descriptionHtml:
Important: Different weather/lighting/texture mods will give different results than shown in screenshots. Also, please post some of your own favorite screenshots.

Requirements:
- Skyrim
- [url=https://reshade.me]Reshade Framework 3.x[/url]
- Windows Vista or higher
- Directx End-User Runtime

Installation Instructions:
-Download the Reshade Framework
-Double-click the Reshade 3.x setup and point the installer to TESV.exe in your main skyrim folder
-Select Direct3D 9 in the Reshade installer
-Select "Yes" to the download of standard effects
-Download my preset(s)
-Extract the included .ini file into your main Skyrim folder
-Load up Skyrim and press Shift+F2 to load my preset(s) using the Reshade GUI

Suggested Mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21642/?]CLO Custom Lighting Overlay[/url] - Fine tuning colors, brightness, bloom
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8707/?]Dragon Warrior Effects 15[/url] - Fine tuning colors, brightness, bloom
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim[/url] - Fine tuning colors, brightness, bloom

Join our discord server for mod info and upcoming changesÂ [url=https://discord.gg/nhbJyQ]https://discord.gg/nhbJyQ[/url]
author: Sengetsu

files.name: Elder Scrolls Reshaded - Steel Tide
files.changelogHtml: Steel Tide: Enabled DPX - looks gr8
